Name: Brick Breaker
About the game: About Brick Breaker is based on the classic arcade brick breaking game, with new 3D effects and animations in a 2D view, it brings a unique experience to the player. How To Play Use the paddle to move left and right to make the ball bounce and break all the bricks in the level, collect coins and powerups that drop from certain bricks. Difficulty Modes Very Easy - Great for young kids that are developing their hand eye coordination or grandparents who need to keep theirs active Easy - Playing for fun Medium - The default mode to play to complete the levels while having a lot of fun Hard - Challenge yourself Impossible - This is very difficult and will make this game probably the most difficult brick breaker you will ever play (Warning - You will swear!) Features 25 levels Global leaderboard to compare yourself to others Achievements Arrow to paddle to control ball direction on launch Pickup items (Health, Gun to paddle, Increase paddle width) Last five maps have a boss (spaceship) that shoots at you
